website_summaries.verdict: Unobtrusive, portable, and reliable, this electric putt return helps golfers train to stay on line anywhere.
pros: Can be easily set to handle short or long putts on most flat surfaces
Returns golf balls quickly and accurately
cons: Ball return occasionally sticks, requiring an override

customer_reviews.title: It has become useless except as an aim point
customer_reviews.text: The ball return quit working after about two days use. It has become useless except as an aim point. I checked the electrical circuit and it is good. This product should be discontinued and a refund should be provided. Please respond to wmclaughlin52@gmail.com.
customer_reviews.author: William McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review, because others said it stopped working after a week. I have had my for a few months now and it still works great. I bought this for my son to practice and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: The Next Tiger Woods...But with fewer mistresses
customer_reviews.text: Every year my friends and I have a summer-long mini-golf tournament. Every single year I lose, by a lot. This year I have decided to put myself on a strict training regimen during the "off season". So far this electric putting machine has worked great! Turns my living room into a mini-golf course. It allows me to combine my putter training with my other favorite thing...watching TV. It consistently returns the ball when I am able to putt it in. Which doesn't always happen. Probably really great for someone with better aim.
customer_reviews.author: DeliverMeToRockville

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have had this for a few days almost a week and use it every few days. I love that you can change how hard it returns the ball to adjust for distances. It also has a spot on it to place your golf ball when you are not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: About 10% of the time, mostly when the ball just barely rolls into the return area (where the ball gets pushed from) it either doesn’t recognize a ball is there or only pushes it a foot or two, making it so the next ball will hit it and send your balls all over the room.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Really nice automatic putting cup
customer_reviews.text: I used to putt into one of these with my Dad several decades ago. Good to see that the technology hasn't changed very much. The ball still kicks back with a satisfying pop after a made putt. I like being able to adjust the amount of distance the ball is returned. It will be interesting to see how long this putting cup lasts, but if my dad's old one is an indication I'll still be putting into this device for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: JP Ronan

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE, DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product. It worked fine for maybe a day. Then each use, the ball would only be returned at reduced percentages. After about a week of use, it would only send the ball back about 5% of the time. Now all it's good for is an aiming point. The trigger that the ball hits is a piece of cheap plastic and even when I used my finger to push on it, the hammer that sends the ball back wouldn't engage at all. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Reid

customer_reviews.title: i like that you dont need expensive batteries
customer_reviews.text: i like that you dont need expensive batteries. however the ball return is very erratic. sometimes it doesnt track all the way over from left position to return hole, also it doesnt push out with enough force to get all the way back on long putts. sometimes it does and sometimes it doesnt.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Schifano

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The putter partner is made of a thin cheap plastic. It’s so light that it moves when it returns the ball. You have to realign the unit very two putts. I can’t recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: First I have to say we really liked this putt return
customer_reviews.text: First I have to say we really liked this putt return. Until it broke a week after we got it We like it enough to try one more it also broke after a week. Very saf
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sterman

customer_reviews.title: Returns the ball very far and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this practice putter return for all of us at work. We use it a lot during the day. It works excellent and returns the ball very far, perfect for when im practicing that long putt. The price was fair and the packaging was good. Overall the practice ball return works very well and I am probably going to get another one for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jay French

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This works much better than I thought it would. Kids seem to enjoy using it and can only help with working on aim. Difficult to say how much it heps with speed and distance but overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ked

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband, he loves it. So does the cat....he chases the balls as it hit them back to you. Great buy for a golfer working on his putting!
customer_reviews.author: 311CHICK

customer_reviews.title: Cheap China junk, burnt up in a month !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in June. I used it a couple times to practice putting. The stopped returning the ball and gave off a loud buzzing sound. The unit began smoking and gave off a bad odor,so I unplugged it . After inspecting the motor was completely burnt. Don't your time or risk a fire. It's junk!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rosano

customer_reviews.title: Quality time
customer_reviews.text: This is just so tried and true and therefore worked very well, just as was true 40 years ago. What matters is this stimulated my Grandson's interest in golf and adds to the joy of time we spend together.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Bad product or bad seller? Not sure, maybe both
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. First one was an Xmas present that was dead on arrival out of the box. Got the replacement, which was a previously opened box and also dead on arrival. Happy to change this review if I could ever get a working product, but until then, bad seller and bad product combine for worst Xmas gift ever
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Michalec

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my Boss' Office...
customer_reviews.text: He loves it! For the price, you can't beat the enjoyment of chatting on speaker phone during a conference call while having a putt-off...PRICELESS. Item works great and has been used 200+ returns with great consistency and since it's adjustable, you can dial it in pretty quickly depending on your distance. No brainer, get one for that golf enthusiast that has some space on a flat surface to practice their putting!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Boi

customer_reviews.title: Good putting set!
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic golf putting set. It has adjustable settings to where you can decide how far for the ball to pop back to you. It also plugs into the wall so you don't have to worry about buying batteries all the time. My husband loved playing with it as did I! I think it will help improve our golf game!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday. He loves using this and can us in the basement of living room. Great that it comes back to you..
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: The return ball feature is adjustable and has enough power ...
customer_reviews.text: The return ball feature is adjustable and has enough power to return a ball 20+ feet on a carpet. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Henry

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Starting smoking and quit working after second use. No stars is good with me.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great Gift, works great. Never hurts to practice when possible.
customer_reviews.author: R.-Lorraine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the beginning of the year. It is now about three months old and its return mechanism only works occasionally. I use this device about once a week and I am very disappointed that is no longer works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Philip H. Metlin

customer_reviews.title: Grand Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Found out our Grandkids liked playing miniature golf. We do not have any courses near by so I got some of these to set up our own course. They love it. I also enjoy practicing with them. The order arrived quickly and they work like they are suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Had this for 2 wks and now won't return the ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 2 wks and now won't return the ball ! won't buy from this seller again. stay clear of this product..
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stark

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works - returns well, and consistently. The return side is made a little lower, so balls hit into the 1,2,3 side on the left roll right over to the sensor and are also returned.
customer_reviews.author: DWAinLA

customer_reviews.title: I like the very fast return & adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is deserving it's ticket from the checkout counter. I like the very fast return & adjustable. This item is a strong buy. 100%
customer_reviews.author: Big Horns & Rocky Mtns

customer_reviews.title: what action c an I take
customer_reviews.text: back in 2017 I bought a titan75ft metal hose thru whatever works catalog ,that hose is now leaking ,this hose was to last for a life time ,please advise me as to what action are available to me ??
customer_reviews.author: joe slayton

customer_reviews.title: Putting stoke practice
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, but careful not to think the course will be so friendly/forgiving. It's much easier to sink a put w/ this than it is on the cours. Nonethless this is a great toy and can really help improve your putting stroke
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a little boy. Wrapped it the day we received it. Gave it to him today and it doesn't work. At all. The ball just sits there, doesn't come back not matter what we do. Went to return it only to find out the return on it expired yesterday, so we are now stuck with a gift that is worthless. Very upset!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in BLACK, not green. Still looks sharp. But aside from the picture being misleading this was exactly what I was looking for around the office. Does exactly what it says. There is a dial on top to adjust the kick-back speed. And a divit on top to keep a ball stored. And the best part is no batteries! Just plug it right into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: meagherdl

customer_reviews.title: Almost 1 year to the day that I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Almost 1 year to the day that I bought it my grandson plugged it in to use it. It got hot and started smoking. Buy and use at your own peril.
customer_reviews.author: brian cleare

customer_reviews.title: This was a prize for a family golf tournament. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a prize for a family golf tournament. was a big hit but have no idea how it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: PATTI

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 month only
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one month right until the day the return time was up. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shoe lover

customer_reviews.title: Makes corporate life bearable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when you want to flip the lync status to "away," make fun of that coworker who just doesn't get it, and pretend you don't hate being stuck in an office 10hrs a day. You can adjust how far it will return the ball. Longest setting will launch it causing the ball to bounce at the the end of our medium sized conference room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I have this in my office
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have this in my office, and it is a nice way to relax and work on my putting game!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon White

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my dad as he is confined ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad as he is confined to his apartment a lot. This reminds me of the old days when he used to golf a lot. He really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caught fire
customer_reviews.text: Caught fire after a few uses. No one was hurt, but we did suffer a small burn to our new carpet. We have kids in the home, and it’s not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Putt your money where your stroke is...
customer_reviews.text: It's an old style putting machine but still the best design made. It works great, allows you to adjust the return speed, and it's priced right.
customer_reviews.author: L. James

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 4 weeks. Until, while using the unit in my office, it made a hissing sound accompanied by white smoke and a terrible burn smell. I picked it up to remove it only to find it very hot to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: EnjoyOutdoors

customer_reviews.title: This product is not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my son in August. Unfortunately, I did not give it to him until Christmas...it was past warranty and he used it for a week and the ball return is already broken. I should have listened to the previous reviews. Its a shame that this product is still offered if this many people are having the same issues. I would not take a chance on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap . Broke after 2 days. I took it apart and found that a wire on the solenoid that launches the ball return had broken. It is easy to fix but I'm not sure I would trust it to leave it plugged in while I'm away from home because I think it could catch on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Trussell

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hubby out of trouble
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to all wives, who want to keep their husbands busy and at home for a bit. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Davy

customer_reviews.title: Got if for a gift and they loved it. shoots the balls way far back
customer_reviews.text: Got if for a gift and they loved it. shoots the balls way far back. he took it to his office to get more practice in you know.
customer_reviews.author: MoMastaT

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for indoors practice
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how fun and practical it is to practice golf. For home use it is perfect and fun
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Good item and fast free shipping  will buy from this seller again Thanks A++
customer_reviews.text: Good item and fast free shipping will buy from this seller again Thanks A++
customer_reviews.author: Kevybar

customer_reviews.title: Electric Putting Partner
customer_reviews.text: This putting partner is fun! I've had it for a little over 2 months now. I use it once in a while when i want to kill some time. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to improve their game.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a prize for a golf outing. It went quick!
customer_reviews.author: jaymaleen

customer_reviews.title: kids broke it within days
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for a few days, sometimes the ball return wouldn't launch the ball back. Let the 4,6 and 8 year old play with it and soon thereafter it stopped working altogether. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M

customer_reviews.title: Great fun as well as a time saving indoor practice aide
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 11 year old step son who has been playing golf now for 2-3 years and he LOVES it(as I would imagine any pre-teen boy would!) oh, his mother isn't usually far from it and a putter as well. All in all, just a great buy that will earn it's money in the rainy days spent inside with the kid making up mini courses and laughing the afternoon away!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas DeLoach

customer_reviews.title: Poor Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Only works maybe 80% of the time, you have to tap the top of it to get the ball to kick back, which kind of defeats the purpose. Going to try and buy something better. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Velding

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money! It's a cute novelty gift but not worth the time and money!
customer_reviews.author: M. Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adjusting the strength of return goes from long to incredibly long. No short returns. Needs to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gives an old golfer some practice in the winter time. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Reints

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses the return became mostly real hatd and woulndt adjust anymore
customer_reviews.author: Mtncarver

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for our 4 year old grandson who loves putting with his Papa.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Good putting aid
customer_reviews.text: I use this most every day. It has help stabilize my putting stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nylander

customer_reviews.title: No end of joy this brings!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and our grandson love this. Bought one for each of them.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little dude is awesome with the adjustable return, how can ya do any better
customer_reviews.author: Vants Anseth

customer_reviews.title: Good ball return
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. The ball return has an adjustable return that works well. Short cord, buy hey, they do make an extension cord. Good ball return
customer_reviews.author: Eagle_eye7

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before estimated time frame, great quality, like that we can adjust the ball return
customer_reviews.author: allyson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Once you get the adjustment dialed in, you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: The Doughboy

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made piston stop working shortly after I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made piston stop working shortly after I got it. I should have gone by the reviews I had read
customer_reviews.author: Wendell J

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Basically all I do when I'm "watching TV" is putting with this little return plugged in near the wall. It certainly beats using a cup any day.
customer_reviews.author: Case Aces

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't seem to shoot the ball as far as ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to shoot the ball as far as the previous one I had for many years (yes I turned it up to high) but it is Okay.
customer_reviews.author: FEL Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Classic Putting Partner
customer_reviews.text: The putting partner is a very good tool for working on my putting at home or on the road. It was delivered on time and in great shape. I use this everyday. I recommend this for anyone who just enjoys putting or wants to improve your golf game.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Carson

customer_reviews.title: great product! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes doesn't return ball, or returns ball with weak power. For the price and convenience, great product! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: A+ when working; F when it's not = C Average
customer_reviews.text: I used it for two weeks and it stopped returning the ball.. I returned it and got a new one... three days later the ball return failed again. If the manufacturer can figure out to reliably work out the kinks on the ball return, this electric putting return would be great...
customer_reviews.author: Stan.L

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 6 year old twin grandchildren to practice putting which they seemed to enjoy. Grandpa enjoyed it even more.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B. Cantor

customer_reviews.title: putter retrevier
customer_reviews.text: Use it every day on my living room rug. I love it and its saved me a few strokes in my golf game. Would recommend it for any serious golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I think the product for the price is fine. It is cheaply made, but for the money I could recommend it. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Burton W. Ruder

customer_reviews.title: Works 50% of the time.
customer_reviews.text: This device is ok, about 50% of the time it returns the ball half way to me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: i've used it a ton. Everything seems to be great. has a little dial to adjust how far it spits it back out. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son and fiance love this little thing. It can be used indoors or outdoors and it's very easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Works great but slides on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Having lots of fun with this but find it slides too easily on the carpet when hit with the ball or when returning the ball. Would be better if it was a little heavier or if it has some sort of non-skid bottom. But for the money, definitely a handy and fun gadget!
customer_reviews.author: tekgurl

customer_reviews.title: Nice practice device
customer_reviews.text: This one returns the ball very well, even if I'm pretty far away. What more can be said? It's fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy and OliverTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: High quality & durable
customer_reviews.text: My man loves this as do kids and it is a great high quality machine. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: This product worked literally 5 times and then broke -- ...
customer_reviews.text: This product worked literally 5 times and then broke -- the ball won't return. I tried to replace it but I'm a few days out of the return window. I don't know if this was a defective unit or if the entire model is a complete rip off but I'm dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Zev Suissa

customer_reviews.title: putting partner quit working
customer_reviews.text: this putting partner quit working feb 18 and I read it wasn,t returnable after feb 7 it started acting up about 2 weeks ago now it dosn,t work just wanted to see if I could trade it for another one
customer_reviews.author: thomas mcmullen

customer_reviews.title: Electric putter partner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my four year old grandson and it thought it was the best birthday present ever - grandpa likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: coolie

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Returns the ball every time (unless you over shoot) & most of the time, directly to you. Great for improving your putting; small enough to be used anywhere indoors & out of the way. This was bought as a gift for my husband & he thinks it does the job! Better than some of the bigger, more involved putting systems. I would recommend this item to a golfer who wants that extra bit of practice whenever he/she feels like it in their own home.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Awful item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and it worked for a couple of days then made a grinding sound and burned out. Great replacement procedure from Amazon and got a second one - it didn't work at all....loser item 0 for 2.
customer_reviews.author: thomas andrew

customer_reviews.title: they really like it.
customer_reviews.text: got this for my son and his boys. they really like it.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Higbee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and exactly as I expected with absolutely no problems. The variable return distance is a must; works like a charm. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gerald P.

customer_reviews.title: If you choose to purchase it I recommend you use it frequently within the first 30 days ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is in a vacation cabin so it it not used frequently. We only turned it on twice from purchase date in August through November and on the second use it stopped working. I can no longer return it because it is past the 30 days but I won't repurchase this item. If you choose to purchase it I recommend you use it frequently within the first 30 days to see if there is a problem with the item so it will be eligible for return or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The two machines worked great! The Grand-daughters each practice with their own putter and their own machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the money
customer_reviews.text: The return mechanism isn't perfect but overall the device is enjoyable to use. I would recommend this if you're thinking about purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Demise

customer_reviews.title: SEEMS TO BE RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to be right with this product however the shipping was delayed even though we ordered next day... the storm delayed it a day and then it didn't get delivered the next business day... which put it late for Christmas... honestly it is still in my closet... not sure what to do...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Does What it Should Do
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what others expected from this item, but it's exactly as described and does what is should. Take it out of the box, plug it in, putt balls into it and it returns them to you - simple. Yes it is not battery operated, but who would want one operated by batteries anyway? It has a standard cord, which is more than long enough, so no power brick. It has an adjustable return force knob which works fine. Not super accurate but not a big deal. Just like the ones I remember made years ago that every executive had in his office at work. I can't see what more you'd want for $16. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. JacquesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Useful Putting Practice
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this purchase. Nice and compact, easy to store and use. Fun to have around anytime I want to practice my putting.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Venne

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: did not work when we got it, but my son and I repaired it.
customer_reviews.author: Albert N. Harris

customer_reviews.title: broke
customer_reviews.text: The ball return broke after about two months of easy use.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: No longer works after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it less than a month ago. No longer works. Will spit the ball back 1 out of 10 times if I'm lucky.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the most sophisticated golf tool I ever used, but it really helped me. Four to Five foot putts use to kill me on the course. This little gadget sets in my office and I putt while on conference calls or when just trying to kill a little time. You can back up farther if you want, the ball return will send the ball quite distance, I have cut down on those short missed putts quite a lot and 2 or 3 strokes a game can make a big difference. Not to mention anytime spent getting use to your putter is time well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Rider_75002

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our office golfers who have found that carpet makes for an interesting put!
customer_reviews.author: SCAStickChick

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Aid
customer_reviews.text: I got this device to help practice my putting during the winter months. It works great and is a fantastic tool.
customer_reviews.author: TDS

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Great
customer_reviews.text: One of those things with no frills and no spills. Does what it says - 80-90% of the time. Sometimes balls don't come all the way back. You can adjust the range of the return strength and long goes a reasonable way. It moves on carpet so goes out of alignment, but as an accuracy practicer it is very very good.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Junk, Not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: Plastic plunger inside ball return mechanism lasted about a week before golf balls would only return three feet from unit at best. Previous model from years back was all metal plunger, some nut must have gotten hurt launching golf balls at himself for them to replace it with this junk. Save your money and go with another model.
customer_reviews.author: JusJed

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Good for first couple of months, then stopped returning ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes worked
customer_reviews.text: First, I ordered this without realizing it had to be plugged in instead of battery operated, this was my fault. However, after using it for a bit (who wouldn't want to use such a cool/fun purchase for putting at home) I realized the return on this putting machine was faulty about 20% of the time. It would not return balls rolled directly to the return slot, often leaving balls for me to go grab (which is against the purpose of the item itself). For this, I give it 2 stars, and would recommend looking elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: GunsGolfGirlsandGOSKATE

product_meta.title: Golf Gifts & Gallery Electric Putting Partner
product_meta.description:
Electronic putting system - a high quality unit with numbered scoring zones and a wide entrance

AMAZON.COM
Improve your putting skills--indoors or outdoors and any time of year--with the Electric Putting Partner. This handy putting trainer features numbered scoring zones and a wide entrance to help you hone your skills. Thanks to automatic ball return, the Putting Partner allows for continuous, un-interrupted practice, and the trainer adjusts for short or long putts to suit your practice needs. Whether you want to refine your putting game in the off season or keep your skills sharp all-year round, the Putting Partner provides a handy solution.
feature_bullets: Electric putting aid for indoor/outdoor use and Jef World of Golf Electric Putting Partner
Adjusts for long or short putts
Ribbed and numbered base tests skills and accuracy
90 day warranty and the cord is 4 feet-10 inches long

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
